mapper.update: update boardnotice set title=#{title}, id=#{id}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum r, t.* from ( select b.*, r.c from boardnotice b left join ( select bno, count(*) c from REPLYNOTICE group by bno) r on b.no = r.bno order by b.no desc) t ) where r between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update boardnotice set cnt = cnt+1 where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum r, t.* from ( select b.*, r.c from boardnotice b left join ( select bno, count(*) c from REPLYNOTICE group by bno) r on b.no = r.bno where ${sql} order by b.no desc) t ) where r between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) cnt from boardnotice where ${sql}
mapper.update: update boardnotice set recommend = recommend+1 where no=#{bno}
mapper.select: select * from recommendnotice where bno=#{bno} and id=#{id}

select * from ( select rownum r, t.* from ( select b.*, r.c from boardnotice b left join ( select bno, count(*) c from REPLYNOTICE group by bno) r on b.no = r.bno where b.recommend > 2 order by b.recommend desc) t ) where r between 1 and 3
select * from ( select no, LAG(no, 1) OVER (order by no) as next, LEAD(no, 1) OVER (order by no) as prev from boardnotice) where no=#{no}
